description:

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://dvyukov%40google.com@code.google.com/p/go/

please revert proc.c and just change the 1 to a 0.
i'm sure we'll need that block again.

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=a5b5cbb9bd3d ***

runtime: enable goroutine preemption
All known issues with preemption have beed fixed.
